sections.title: Verse 1
content: That saved a wretch like me!
I once was lost, but now am found,
Was blind, but now I see.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,
How precious did that grace appear,

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Through many dangers, toils, and snares,
'Twas grace hath brought us safe thus far,
And grace will lead us home.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: When we've been there ten thousand years,
We've no less days to sing God's praise
